# 文件系统层次结构标准中文版

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/wenjianxitong-cengcijiegou-biaozhun-zhongwenban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/wenjianxitong-cengcijiegou-biaozhun-zhongwenban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install wenjianxitong-cengcijiegou-biaozhun-zhongwenban
wenjianxitong-cengcijiegou-biaozhun-zhongwenban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g wenjianxitong-cengcijiegou-biaozhun-zhongwenban
wenjianxitong-cengcijiegou-biaozhun-zhongwenban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
